explains: adj. （洞）豁开的；（伤口）敞开的；（嘴巴）张大的

sentences.en: He stood yawning, his pyjama jacket gaping open.
sentences.cn: 他敞开睡衣站着打呵欠。

sentences.en: The aircraft took off with a gaping hole in its fuselage.
sentences.cn: 那飞机起飞了，机身上有一个裂开的洞。

sentences.en: After his wife left, there was a gaping hole in his life.
sentences.cn: 妻子离开后，他的人生中出现了一大片空洞。
